name: autarc
headline: autarc is the OS for Europe's One-Stop Energy Installers
description:
With autarc we are building the OS for Europe's One-Stop Energy Installers. We are live with 400 customers and an ARR of $1.4 million.

The problem: Energy installers are eager to expand their deployment of heat pump and photovoltaic systems, yet they are constrained by inefficient sales, planning, and installation processes.

The solution: Our B2B software integrates CRM, planning, and design tools into a unified platform. This enables SMB installers to drastically cut down the pre-installation phase of home energy projects—from several weeks to just minutes. By leveraging LiDAR for spatial analysis, computer vision for automated assessment, and AI for system recommendations, we streamline the entire workflow. This results in a time reduction of up to 90%, enabling installers to confidently transition to and scale up sustainable home energy solutions.

founders.name: Etienne-Noel Krause, Founder
founders.description:
Etienne, Co-Founder & CEO of autarc. I used to work in the HVAC industry before launching autarc. Would describe myself as a creative mind that loves building digital products.

Get in touch: etienne@autarc.energy

founders.name: Thies Hansen, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and COO of autarc. Previously worked at a logistics company within process optimizations, later switched to work in startups and VC - helping installers to install more heat pumps is much more fun though.

founders.name: Marius Seufzer, Founder
founders.description:
CTO @autarc.
Previously Lead iOS Engineer @Sameday Health and built Passkeys for Apple.

## Why autarc?
![Uhr Symbol](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ed3f380e99ef9567e1d072/65699c018f5de07a866d2440_Group%20482166.svg)
The fastest way to data
With autarc, you can quickly access via 600 relevant house data thanks to artificial intelligence. In just 10 minutes enter all necessary information, supplemented with pictures at the customer's site. This step can also be taken over by inexperienced colleagues.
![Sicherheit Symbol](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ed3f380e99ef9567e1d072/65699c01f9738c8487d50db2_Group%20482167.svg)
Higher offer quality
Through the data Does quality increase your offers by 90%. With precise and comprehensive information, you can offer tailor-made solutions. For you, this means: more successful deals And a quick contract processing.
![Schloss Symbol](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ed3f380e99ef9567e1d072/65699c0166880e76db41fee8_Group%20482168.svg)
No plant failures
Wrongly dimensioned or timed heat pumps are a thing of the past. Our precise analysis enables a optimal system planning. The result is powerful, efficient heat pumps that are precisely tailored to the needs of your customers. For you, that means: fewer plant failures and therefore happier customers.

**Company Overview: Autarc**

- **Name**: Autarc
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Location**: Berlin, Germany
- **Team Size**: 15 employees
- **Y Combinator Batch**: S24

**Mission**: Autarc aims to be the operating system (OS) for Europe's one-stop energy installers, transforming how energy solutions are installed and managed.

---

### The Problem

Energy installers are eager to expand their offerings in heat pump and photovoltaic systems but face significant challenges due to inefficient sales, planning, and installation processes. They often find themselves bogged down by lengthy pre-installation phases that can span several weeks.

### The Solution

Autarc provides a B2B software platform that integrates CRM, planning, and design tools into a unified system. 

1. **Rapid Deployment**: Their software dramatically reduces the pre-installation phase for home energy projects from weeks to mere minutes, thanks to advanced technologies like:
   - **LiDAR** for spatial analysis
   - **Computer Vision** for automated assessments
   - **AI** for system recommendations
   
2. **Efficiency Boost**: This streamlined workflow yields up to a **90% reduction in time**, empowering small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to scale up their operations and confidently transition to sustainable energy solutions.

### Current Status

- **Customer Base**: Live with 400 customers
- **Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR)**: $1.4 million
- **Key Partner**: Nicolas Dessaigne

### Product Offerings

Autarc provides several tools tailored for energy installers:
- **Heat Pump Check**: Quick assessment for heat pump suitability.
- **Customer Portal**: Modern communication between installers and customers.
- **Quotation Tool**: Enhances offer quality through better data parsing.
- **LiDAR Scan**: Conducts heat load assessments and hydraulic balancing in under 10 minutes.
- **Funding Service**: Assists customers in applying for relevant financial support.

### Industry Tagging

Autarc is categorized under:
- Artificial Intelligence
- LiDAR
- Computer Vision
- B2B
- Climate

### Website

You can learn more about Autarc and explore their solutions on their website: [autarc.energy](https://www.autarc.energy/en).

### Conclusion

In a world increasingly focusing on sustainable energy, Autarc positions itself uniquely as a pivotal player.
